pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, July 28, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador

Private meetings.

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Newfoundland and Labrador, Andrew Furey.

Closed to media.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Premier of Newfoundland and Labrador Andrew Furey will make brief statements to the media.

Confederation Building, Main Foyer
100 Prince Philip Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:00 p.m.

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister, Premier of Newfoundland and Labrador Andrew Furey, Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Ahmed Hussen, and Minister of Natural Resources Seamus O’Regan Jr. will visit the College of the North Atlantic where they will make an announcement. A media availability will follow.

College of the North Atlantic, Prince Philip Drive Campus
1 Prince Philip Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 2:15 p.m.
